SEARCH
Package JEST.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
JEST.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
The class starts a game, load or save one, play a round, and determines the winner.
See Also:

    • addHumanPlayer

      public void addHumanPlayer(String firstName, String lastName, Player.InterfaceType interfaceType)
      Add a human player, with his interface type.
      Parameters:
      firstName - player's first name.
      lastName - player's last name.
      interfaceType - the interface (console or GUI) chosen by the player.

      Prepare the beginning of the game : create the players, fill the deck, etc.

    • initializeDeckAndTrophies

      public void initializeDeckAndTrophies()
      Initialize deck and trophies only (players are already added). Used when players are configured through GUI.

    • playRound

      public void playRound()
      Play a round in 3 phases, like in the rules : deal cards, make offers, and take cards.

    • getTrophyCards

      public List<Card> getTrophyCards()

    • endGameIfNecessary

      public boolean endGameIfNecessary()
      If the Decks (the general and restOfCards) are empty, we determine the winner. If it is not the case, the game continues.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over.

    • getGeneralDeck

      public Deck getGeneralDeck()

    • getRestOfCards

      public Deck getRestOfCards()

    • suggestSaving

      public boolean suggestSaving()
      Suggest the player if he wants to save his game ("1" to continue, "2" to save).
      Returns:
      true if the game is saved or false if the game is not saved.

      public List<Player> getPlayers()
